Room.Name: Tower Lane/Kista Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: This is the intersection of Tower Lane and Kista Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Tower Lane is a major east-west throughfare in the city of Kista. Directly west it dead-ends at the city's Detention and Correctional Facility, where society's ingrates are incarcerated. It doesn't really have a correctional program, but it certainly has an excellent detention policy. Even innocent visitors have been known to go in and never come out.
